import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import FormCheckout from './FormCheckout'; import { createAPI, MapAPI } from "../../../src/api/index"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; const Checkout = () => { const [checkout, setCheckout] = useState([]) const dataCart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cartItems")) const addOrEdit = (formDataCheckout, resetForm) => { if (formDataCheckout.get('idKhach') == 0) createAPI(MapAPI.CHECKOUT).create(formDataCheckout) .then(res => { toast.success(`đặt hàng thành công`, { position: "top-right", }); console.log("data: ", formDataCheckout); }).catch(err => console.log(err)) resetForm() } return (
{/* main */}
